subject: Surgery and Surgeons
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Louisville freshman Clarence Holloway had open-heart surgery yesterday morning to repair a wall of his aorta and his aortic valve. Holloway, a 7-foot-1 center from Chicago, had the operation after a physical Friday found the heart condition, university officials said.
